transcript:
Executive: keh raha hu sir aapki services aapne remove karai hai aur aapke account pehle Adarsh ji the to aapne aapko sir TrustSeal mein interested the TrustSeal karna tha to abhi aapka sir aapko bataya gaya tha ki 120 dino ke andar hum aapka full adjustment kar sakte hain aur aapka sir itna matlab kitna din bacha hai abhi 120 din mein

Executive: isko batao ek hafta yada panch che din bache hue hain sir theek hai aur jo hai aap agar interested ho to aapka full paisa adjust 3340 karke
Customer: Hello
Executive: ha sir boliye
Customer: ha danu ji
Executive: ha mail open hua aapne
Customer: ab kya karna
Executive: ha aap mail open karo aap mail pe dekho invitation aaya India mart ka
Customer: ha aaya aaya
Executive: join karo waha pe join with google meet ka option hai join karo


Executive: sir karega ki nahi to sir karega fund ka issue

Executive: nahi hoga wo 36 wale pe nahi hota hai 36 wale pe nahi hota hai teen mahine ka client hai na
Executive: 36 din ka data hota hai do saal se 90 din se upar ho gaya
Executive: hello
Customer: ha ha ek minute
Executive: whatsapp pe bhi bheja hai maine sir
Customer: ha dhyan diya dhyan diya

Executive: aap soch rahe to main India mart ka aadmi nahi hun
Executive: aapke jo mail gaya hua hai na wo company se mail gaya hai sir India mart ke agar aap dekhoge to
Customer: theek hai
Executive: aur mera information aapko aapke app mein mil jayega photo naam pata mobile number address email id whatsapp number sara sab kuch aapke mobile mein mil jayega mera khud photo sahit

Executive: kya abhi join kyu nahi kar pa rahe ho sir time lag raha hai aapko bahut
Executive: already sir aapke piche bahut time ja chuka hai aaj

Executive: share screen competition mode join
(silence)
(silence)
(silence)
[unintelligible]
Executive: the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line
Executive: aap jisse se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold kar rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance with TrustSeal process.

- Customer is unable to join Google Meet.



Resolution:

- Executive explained TrustSeal adjustment policy.

- Executive sent Google Meet link on WhatsApp.

- Executive assured customer of his IndiaMART identity.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive asked customer to join Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, google meet, adjustment, invitation
